params.taskDescription:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>P</mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>the letter is a vowel</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mo stretchy="false">|</mo>
    </mrow>
  </mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>the number is orange</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">P({\text{the letter is a vowel}}{|}{\text{the number is orange}})</annotation></semantics></math>

questionSetStimulus: You are about to roll a special 6-sided die that has both a colored letter and a colored number on each face. The faces are labeled with: a red 1 and a blue A, a red 1 and a green A, an orange 1 and a green B, an orange 2 and a red C, a purple 3 and a brown D, an orange 4 and a blue E. Find the given conditional probabilities:
